title: Hot or Not? - American Craft logo
content:
what do we think of how the word 'craft' is rendered?  
is it brilliant or a little too much?  
the entire word is almost a ligature, which made me wonder if there are any other good examples of words consisting of letters connected in such a way to form a ligature.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023022236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_5937.jpg)
author: hereandthere

comments.content: Has a sort of Herb Lubalin feel. I think it is nice.
It would work better if the word the designer was setting was supposed to be "craf't" with an apostrophe.
I really like how it flows. The negative and positive shapes work nicely together, and it's not often I see a whole ligatured word.
yeah, that negative space apostrophe is nice. too bad the word is not craf ' t
